titleInfo.title: Charter of B'nai B'rith No. 171 of Denver, Colorado

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 10 x 8 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On back of photograph: ''#170 Charter of Denver Lodge #171 granted by Grand District Lodge # 2, Independent Order of B'nai B'rith Apr, 1872. donor B'nai B'rith Lodge #171 Jack J. Goldman commercial photography 1473 holly st. de. 3-0673 Denver 20, Colorado''. On envelope: ''#173 Charter of B'nai B'rith Lodge #171, 1872''.

mods.abstract: B'nai B'rith Denver Lodge No. 171 charter listing the names of applicants. A number of Denver's early prominent Jewish pioneers are listed on the charter, including Julius Londoner, David Kline, Fred Z. Salomon and his brother Hyman, Michael Hattenbach, Louis Anfenger, Philip Trounstine, Edward Pisko and Dr. John Elsner.
mods.note: Appears in ''Images of America, Jewish Denver: 1859-1940'' by Dr. Jeanne Abrams on page 72.
Donated by B'nai B'rith. Denver Lodge No. 171.
